column5: My buddy got a Marcum lx9 delivered last week, it has a scratched lens (they are sending a new one) but it aint bad...you can see pretty good despite that.  Here is a little vid of a stocked bow taking a look.
great video and the music fit it perfectly  thanks for sharing
He scared it off.LOL  Try lifting that bait real slow. I,ll bet it would of hit.  Cool Simon.

How deep ?  Dunno, i was not there, probably not more than 8'.    great video and the music fit it perfectly  thanks for sharing Thanks DB!  He scared it off.LOL  Try lifting that bait real slow. I,ll bet it would of hit.  Cool Simon.  Lol, i'll tell him that, should get a good response.
